controls.reset-markers-confirm: This will reset all markers to their default state (visible). Continue?
controls.backup-save-confirm:
This will download a backup copy of all your map settings.

The file will be saved as: __fileName__

Continue?
controls.backup-load-fail: Restore failed, please double-check your file
controls.backup-load-unsupported: The backup feature is not available because your browser does not support the HTML5 File API.

sidebar.info:
This page is under active development.
If you find any issues, please let us know on GitHub.

dead-eye-target.label: Deadeye Target
dead-eye-target.desc: Each map includes 3 Deadeye Targets that only the most accomplished sharpshooters can hit. Such deadly accuracy will earn you special rewards.

generator.label: Generator
generator.desc: Use these noisy machines to mask the sound of your shots.

objective-primary.label: Primary Objective
objective-primary.desc: Primary objectives must be met to complete the mission.

objective-optional.label: Optional Objective
objective-optional.desc: Optional objectives are... well, optional. Complete them to earn extra points.

objective-exit.label: Mission Exit
objective-exit.desc: Go here after completing all primary objectives to finish the mission.
